snippet: Decisions on purchases — experiential or material — may reveal more about your personality, according to two studies.
abstract: Studies published in Journal of Positive Psychology find that people who spend more on food, travel and other experiences tend to be more adventurous, happier and well-liked than those who spend their money on material things.
lead_paragraph: Decisions on purchases — experiential or material — may reveal more about your personality, according to two studies.

headline.seo: Studies Link Personalities to Buying Habits
headline.main: I Buy, Therefore I Am (Unless I Return It)
headline.print_headline: I Buy, Therefore I Am (Unless I Return It)
